mapper.insert: insert into galleries ( title, content, writer, club_id ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{clubId} )

insert into gallery_images ( gallery, img ) values
(#{galleryId}, #{i})
insert into gallery_comments( gallery, parent, writer, content ) values ( #{gallery_id}, #{parent}, #{user_id}, #{comment} )
mapper.select: select max(id) from galleries where writer=#{writer}
select gallery as GALLERY, id as ID, img as IMG from gallery_images where gallery = #{ID} order by id desc

select g.id as ID, g.title as TITLE, g.content as CONTENT, (select nickname from users u where u.id=g.writer) as WRITER, DATE_FORMAT(g.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as CREATED_AT, g.view_count as VIEW_COUNT from galleries g where id=#{id} order by g.id desc;

select c.id as ID, (select nickname from users u where u.id = c.writer) as WRITER, c.content as CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as CREATED_AT, c.parent as PARENT from gallery_comments c where c.gallery = #{id} order by c.id desc

select c.id as ID, (select nickname from users u where u.id = c.writer) as WRITER, c.content as CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as CREATED_AT, c.parent as PARENT from gallery_comments c where c.parent = #{id} order by c.id desc
mapper.update: update galleries set view_count=view_count+1 where id=#{id}
